EmailTemplate.name: Beth Taylor Introduction
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Protection Technologies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
<?xml:namespace prefix = v ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:vml" />
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I would like to take this opportunity to introduce myself as your DuPont Account Manager for Nomex® and Kevlar® products.
My initial goal as your Account Manager is to better understand the specifics about your business for future growth opportunities. I will be calling you in the near future to introduce myself on a more personal level to discuss your company’s products and services.
In the meantime, if you have any questions or requests, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Sincerely, Beth L Taylor
________________________________________________
DuPont Protection Technologies • Account Manager
Nomex®/ Kevlar® • 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway • Richmond VA 23234
Phone: (877) 713 -1299 •Fax: (800)-876-9566• beth.l.taylor@usa.dupont.com
The information contained in this letter is DuPont Confidential Information.
